body: Just tried to tip someone's post with 7 coins ([context](https://ruqqus.com/+GoForCoins/post/5bkz/ruqqus-mascot-redesign-competition/ij4e)), and it looks like only 1 or 2 coins went through. Did I just break Ruqqus? @captainmeta4 @kek
body_html: Just tried to tip someone's post with 7 coins (context), and it looks like only 1 or 2 coins went through. Did I just break Ruqqus? @captainmeta4 @kek
title: Is there a coin limit/bug for tipping comments?

body:
They have you listed with 7 coins on the post—so I'd assume that it did.

Edit: I just noticed that they responded to you about it. So, it might just be a visual errour on your end.
body_html:
They have you listed with 7 coins on the post—so I'd assume that it did.

Edit: I just noticed that they responded to you about it. So, it might just be a visual errour on your end.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
The number displayed is the number of users who tipped the comment. In my opinion, it's very misleading. @kek, please add a tooltip saying something like "The number of users who tipped this post/comment".

Edit: By the way, pinging doesn't work in posts.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
The number displayed is the number of users who tipped the comment. In my opinion, it's very misleading. @kek, please add a tooltip saying something like "The number of users who tipped this post/comment".

Edit: By the way, pinging doesn't work in posts.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
